DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to measure the effects of AZD1305 on cardiac electrophysiological properties and intracardiac pressures
DOC.criteria: Patients with atrial flutter (with a ventricular rate of <100 beats/minute at enrolment), scheduled for curative catheter ablation Sinus rhythm at randomisation QTc (Fridericia, QTcF ) >450 ms measured in sinus rhythm at randomisation, Serum potassium below 3.8 or above 5.0 mmol/L or plasma potassium below 3.6 or above 5.0 mmol/L QRS duration >120 ms at randomisation
